name: S'More Heavenly Than Expected
description:
for the GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam
theme: Death is only the beginning
https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-jam-2022

You're getting ready to enjoy some s'mores on a camping trip, when suddenly you discover you're dead. You're the proud owner of a new harp and shiny head-gear, and there are clouds and gold roads... There's got to be s'mores here, right?

Collect marshmallows, chocolate, graham crackers and sticks to make s'mores in Heaven, and then find the door to the 'campfire.'

The story part should start immediately as the game starts running (ie, after clicking on "run game); click on it again after the first short voice bit to get to the main game scene.

Use WASD and/or arrow keys to move.

**Note: updated to change speed of player movement**

Enjaku: sound, voice, music (psaltery), art
Rainsong: coding, level-design

Software: Unity 2018, Reaper, Pyxel Edit, Aseprite

GitHub link: https://github.com/RainsongTaurandira/Heavenly-Smores-Game which has pretty much the same stuff in the source code zip.
